https://www.fireeye.com/content/dam/fireeye-www/global/en/current-threats/pdfs/rpt-poison-ivy.pdf,POISON IVY:Assessing Damage and Extracting Intelligence,open source,Stage 1: Preparation,Planning,Exploitation of Vulnerability,Poison Ivy remote access tool,The attacker used injected JavaScript on the compromised websites to redirect targets to an Internet Explorer exploit that dropped Stage 1 launcher/downloader mobile code.
